title: 6.4.4 Create AuthMiddleware and API endpoints
body:
## Parent Issue
#26 - 6.4 Basic Authentication

## Objective
Create auth middleware and API endpoints.

## Endpoints
- POST /api/v1/auth/register
- POST /api/v1/auth/login
- POST /api/v1/auth/refresh
- POST /api/v1/auth/logout
- GET /api/v1/auth/me
- PUT /api/v1/auth/me
- PUT /api/v1/auth/password

## Middleware
- Extract Bearer token from Authorization header
- Validate token and inject user_id into request state
- Return 401 for invalid/missing token

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/middleware/auth.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/api/routers/auth.py`
- `tests/auth/test_*.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All endpoints work
- [ ] Middleware validates tokens
- [ ] 401 for protected routes without token
- [ ] 80%+ test coverage

## Estimated Time
3 hours
